articles.title: Covid vaccination proof still required to enter America in 2023 - Daily Mail
articles.description: The Transportation Security Administration (TSA) has extended the rule in the US until at least January 8 next year to 'limit the risk of Covid-19, including variants of the virus'.
articles.content:
Travelers flying into the United States will still need proof of Covid vaccination in 2023 making the US the only country in the West to stick by the failing policy.

articles.title: Lunar Eclipse 2022: Date, Time And How To Watch Last "Blood Moon" This Year In India - NDTV
articles.description: Parts of India and the globe will witness another celestial event on Tuesday as a "Blood Moon" will be visible for approximately 85 minutes from North America, parts of South America, Asia, Australia and New Zealand.
articles.content:
Moon will pass into Earth's shadow and turn red on November 8. (File)
